views.markdown:
Tested on version 10.39.1.1
Working on iOS 10 and 11

Add some features to SnapChat app

- No Screen Shot Detector.
- No Screen Recording Detector.
- Hide From Camera Roll.
- Hide From Memories.
- Email Verify / Phone Verify.
- Hide Typing.
- Custom Snap Views.
- Custom Snap Score.

More on the way ..

Translations :
French : by DzMoha (@dzmohaipa)
Russian : by ReJail (@rejailrepo)
Arabic : by تركي الحربي (@a1harbi_ksa)

This Tweak includes anti jailbreak detection only, no more protection so still have risk of ban by using it .

If you like my work, follow me on Twitter or Donate .

Configure options from Settings.

- Hide from Camera Roll / Memories working perfectly!.
- Famous user option removed!
+ Add support for languages (French, Russian, Arabic).
+ Add custom snap views option.
+ Add custom snap score option.
+ Anti-jailbreak detection ( you still have risk of ban).
